scripts.predist: npm run clean && npm run lint
scripts.dist:development: parcel build src/*.ts && tsc -d true --emitDeclarationOnly true src/*.ts --outDir dist
scripts.dist:production:browser: parcel build src/*.ts --log-level 1 && tsc -d true --emitDeclarationOnly true src/*.ts --outDir dist
scripts.dist:development:umd: parcel src/*.ts --global Promise && tsc -d true --emitDeclarationOnly true src/*.ts --outDir dist
scripts.dist:production:umd: parcel build src/*.ts --global Promise && tsc -d true --emitDeclarationOnly true src/*.ts --outDir dist
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:aplus
scripts.prepack: npm install && npm run clean && npm run dist:production:umd
